Recommendation.title: Resolve Server Overload Due to High CPU Usage and Excessive Connections

steps.action: Analyze CPU Usage with Monitoring Tools
steps.description: Identify processes consuming excessive CPU to detect potential issues like infinite loops or resource-intensive tasks.
Fix infinite loops, optimize database queries, and implement caching to reduce CPU load.
Increase the worker_connections value in Nginx to handle more connections and prevent overload.
Distribute traffic across multiple servers to avoid overloading a single server.
Reduce server load by caching static requests, minimizing the need for repeated processing.
Continuously monitor CPU usage and connections to proactively manage server performance and prevent future overloads.
